sinhala sanskruthin ha sampradayan menma poduwe sinhalaya kisima wadagammakata nathi jathiyak bawa hangawima ilakka karagena karana siyalu katayuthu pahasuwen kara ganima pinisama mema kalu suddanta balagathu thanathuru pawa laba ganimata katayuthu sampadanaya wi atha.gaurawaniya sthanaya ha sinhalayage mulika ayithiwasikam pawa ullanghanaya wime prathipaththi athulath kirimata, nawa wyawasthawak sandaha ketumpath sampadanaya kirimata balaya laba di athi aya kisima aakarayakin shri lankawe maha jathiya wana sinhala jathiya niyojanaya nokarana aya wima sadharanikaranaya karanne keseda?api mema wikara, uda karanam, sarkas sandarshanaya desa nihadawa bala sitiya athi apawa polambaawa ganimata owun sanhidiyawa, sahajiwanaya wani sankalpayan pawichchi karathi.

dewinuwara uthpalawarna shri wishnu maha dewalaye warshika randoli maha perahara pereda (13) athi uthkarshawath lesa pawathwuna athara delakshayaka pamana bathimathhu pirisak perahara narambaimata ekwa sitiyaha.dewinuwara paramawichithrarama rajamaha wiharaye di amarapura shri kalyanawansha maha nikaye anunayaka, aacharya dewinuwara siri sunanda mahimipanan pradhana maha sangharathnaya hamuwe aagamika wathawathwala yedunu basnayaka nilame dishan wikramarathna gunasekara mahatha pradhana pariwara dewala bharakaruwan in anathuruwa shri wishnu maha dewalaye chiragatha sampradayanukula wathawath pawathwa awariya pandama dalwimen anathuruwa perahara withi sancharaya kirima arambauni.yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathi dalas alahapperuma mahatha wisin sadhathuka karanduwa mangala hasthirajaya pitata wadama kala athara aarthika sanwardhana niyojya amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana, rajya paripalana niyojya amathi wijaya dahanayaka, palath sanskruthika amathi di. wi. upul, palath sabha manthri (hitapu basnayaka nilame) kanchana wijesekara mahathwaru me awasthawata ekwuha.wideshiya sancharakayo rasak da perahara narambaimata pamina sitiyaha.
